definition: to work for/to devote one's efforts to
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: The candidate's campaign was attended with too much ballyhoo .
sentences.chinese: 這個候選人的競選活動致力於太多的大舉造勢。

sentences.english: The government has also engaged Western experts in crisis management.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府還致力於提高政府公共危機管理水平。

sentences.english: But Putin has deftly managed the windfall and spread the wealth enough so that people feel hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 普京確實致力於將財富分散，所以人們覺得有盼頭。

sentences.english: Professor Zhong Nanshan devoted himself to the cure of SARS.
sentences.chinese: 鍾南山教授致力於SARS的治療。

sentences.english: Policy-makers need to be aiming for gender-neutral policies.
sentences.chinese: 決策者需要致力於制定性別平等的政策。

sentences.english: We had to dedicate ourselves to this openness and these channels between our classrooms and schools.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須致力於建立教室與學校之間的公開與通道。

sentences.english: He has been behind Apple’s push to unify the software that powers its mobile devices and its Macintosh computers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直致力於推進移動設備和蘋果電腦軟件的融合。

sentences.english: Boguan Advertisement has been committed to providing advertising services for the jewel and jade industry.
sentences.chinese: 博觀廣告一直致力於珠寶玉石領域的專業廣告服務。

sentences.english: He was single -mindedly devoted to the hastening of freedom for the oppressed.
sentences.chinese: 他一心一意致力於早日讓被壓迫者獲得自由。

sentences.english: Some Scriptures said to focus my ministry and my life on God and God alone.
sentences.chinese: 一些經文教導我要把我的神職和生命致力於上帝一個。

sentences.english: Are you trying to climb the ladder of success in your career?
sentences.chinese: 你是否致力於攀登事業成功的階梯？

sentences.english: Rather, the author should strive to be clear, to avoid misunderstanding and confusion.
sentences.chinese: 論文必須致力於保持文意清晰，避免造成誤解或混淆。

sentences.english: Working on step three, at this point, would be foolish.
sentences.chinese: 此時此刻，致力於第三步是很愚蠢的。

sentences.english: Here is a man truly dedicated to improving the lot of his fellow Ecuadorians.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個真心致力於改善民衆生活的人。

sentences.english: It is devoted to discussion of Chinese T&I issues.
sentences.chinese: 它致力於向中國電訊我問題的討論。

sentences.english: The team is now working on ways to make the holograms even smaller.
sentences.chinese: 這個團隊現在正致力於將全息圖製作地更小。

definition: to have as its purpose/to be intended to/to aim to (do sth)
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
first (hotel of its type, store of its type etc)
to take root/to establish a base
